verses.verse: And <S%H3548>now<s%>, O ye priests, this commandment is for <S%H4687>you<s%>.

If ye will not <S%H8085>hear<s%>, and if ye will not <S%H7760>lay<s%> it to <S%H3820>heart<s%>, to <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H3519>glory<s%> unto my <S%H8034>name<s%>, <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, then will I <S%H7971>send<s%> the <S%H3994>curse<s%> upon <S%H779>you<s%>, and I will curse your <S%H1293>blessings<s%>; <S%H779>yea<s%>, I have cursed them <S%H7760>already<s%>, because ye do not lay it to <S%H3820>heart<s%>.

Behold <S%H1605><s%>, I will rebuke your <S%H2233>seed<s%>, and will <S%H2219>spread<s%> <S%H6569>dung<s%> upon your <S%H6440>faces<s%>, even the <S%H6569>dung<s%> of your <S%H2282>feasts<s%>; and ye shall be taken away with <S%H5375>it<s%>.

And ye shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I have <S%H7971>sent<s%> this <S%H4687>commandment<s%> unto <S%H1285>you<s%>, that my covenant may be with <S%H3878>Levi<s%>, <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>.

My <S%H1285>covenant<s%> was with him of <S%H2416>life<s%> and <S%H7965>peace<s%>; and I <S%H5414>gave<s%> them to him that he might <S%H4172>fear<s%>; and he <S%H3372>feared<s%> <S%H6440>me<s%>, and stood in <S%H2865>awe<s%> of my <S%H8034>name<s%>.

The <S%H8451>law<s%> of <S%H571>truth<s%> was in his <S%H6310>mouth<s%>, and <S%H5766>unrighteousness<s%> was not <S%H4672>found<s%> in his <S%H8193>lips<s%>: he <S%H1980>walked<s%> with me in <S%H7965>peace<s%> and <S%H4334>uprightness<s%>, and <S%H7725>turned<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H7725>away<s%> from <S%H5771>iniquity<s%>.

For the <S%H3548>priest<s%>'s <S%H8193>lips<s%> should <S%H8104>keep<s%> <S%H1847>knowledge<s%>, and they should <S%H1245>seek<s%> the <S%H8451>law<s%> at his <S%H6310>mouth<s%>; for he is the <S%H4397>messenger<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>.

But ye are <S%H5493>turned<s%> aside out of the <S%H1870>way<s%>; ye have caused <S%H7227>many<s%> to <S%H3782>stumble<s%> in the <S%H8451>law<s%>; ye have <S%H7843>corrupted<s%> the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi<s%>, <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>.

Therefore have I also <S%H5414>made<s%> you <S%H959>contemptible<s%> and <S%H8217>base<s%> before all the <S%H5971>people<s%>, <S%H6310>according<s%> as ye have not <S%H8104>kept<s%> my <S%H1870>ways<s%>, but have had <S%H5375>respect<s%> of persons in the <S%H8451>law<s%>.

Have we not all <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H1>father<s%>? hath not <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H410>God<s%> <S%H1254>created<s%> <S%H898>us<s%>? why do we deal treacherously every <S%H376>man<s%> against his <S%H251>brother<s%>, <S%H2490>profaning<s%> the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of our <S%H1>fathers<s%>?

Judah <S%H3063><s%> hath dealt <S%H898>treacherously<s%>, and an <S%H8441>abomination<s%> is <S%H6213>committed<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>; for <S%H3063>Judah<s%> hath <S%H2490>profaned<s%> the <S%H6944>holiness<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> which he <S%H157>loveth<s%>, and hath <S%H1166>married<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of a <S%H5236>foreign<s%> <S%H410>god<s%>.

Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> will cut <S%H3772>off<s%>, to the <S%H376>man<s%> that <S%H6213>doeth<s%> <S%H5782>this<s%>, him that waketh and him that <S%H6030>answereth<s%>, out of the <S%H168>tents<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>, and him that <S%H5066>offereth<s%> an <S%H4503>offering<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>.

And this <S%H8145>again<s%> ye <S%H6213>do<s%>: ye <S%H3680>cover<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> with <S%H1832>tears<s%>, with <S%H1065>weeping<s%>, and with <S%H603>sighing<s%>, insomuch that he <S%H6437>regardeth<s%> not the <S%H4503>offering<s%> any <S%H3947>more<s%>, neither receiveth it with good <S%H7522>will<s%> at your <S%H3027>hand<s%>.

Yet ye <S%H559>say<s%>, <S%H4100>Wherefore<s%>? Because <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> hath been <S%H5749>witness<s%> between thee and the <S%H802>wife<s%> of thy <S%H5271>youth<s%>, against whom thou hast dealt <S%H898>treacherously<s%>, though she is thy <S%H2278>companion<s%>, and the <S%H802>wife<s%> of thy <S%H1285>covenant<s%>.

And did he not <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H259>one<s%>, although he had the <S%H7605>residue<s%> of the <S%H7307>Spirit<s%>? And wherefore <S%H259>one<s%>? He <S%H1245>sought<s%> a <S%H430>godly<s%> <S%H2233>seed<s%>. Therefore take <S%H8104>heed<s%> to your <S%H7307>spirit<s%>, and let none deal <S%H898>treacherously<s%> against the <S%H802>wife<s%> of his <S%H5271>youth<s%>.

For I <S%H8130>hate<s%> putting <S%H7971>away<s%>, <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and him that <S%H3680>covereth<s%> his <S%H3830>garment<s%> with <S%H2555>violence<s%>, <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>: therefore take <S%H8104>heed<s%> to your <S%H7307>spirit<s%>, that ye deal not <S%H898>treacherously<s%>.

Ye have <S%H3021>wearied<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> with your <S%H1697>words<s%>. Yet ye <S%H559>say<s%>, Wherein have we <S%H3021>wearied<s%> <S%H559>him<s%>? In that ye say, Every one that <S%H6213>doeth<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> is <S%H2896>good<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and he <S%H2654>delighteth<s%> in <S%H430>them<s%>; or where is the God of <S%H4941>justice<s%>?
